main event: A commercial pilot observed a saucer-shaped object approximately 50 feet in diameter near Boise, Idaho on 23 September 1952.
interesting points: The object was about 1,500 feet above the aircraft and moving east to west., The object traveled at an estimated speed of 420 knots., It was described as silvery in color and reflecting sunlight., After several minutes, the object disappeared from view at a very high rate of speed., An ADIZ scramble was ordered but the object was not seen again.
